item.title: Language
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-red); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-red); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-red); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-red); } Language in Vekllei q CULTURE Article ðŸ”” This article is about Vekllei 1. Overview Â¶ The language of Vekllei is an important part of the project. Utopianism cascades through every part of society, and rethinking communication is a foundational part of that instinct.

item.title: Religion
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-red); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-red); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-red); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-red); } Religion in Vekllei d CULTURE Article ðŸ”” This article is about Vekllei 1. Overview Â¶ Upen is the nondenominational animistic spiritualism of Vekllei. It is both an organised religious belief system and a decentralised local animism, localised regionally across the Home Islands and beyond.
